import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import {Payment} from "./Payment"; var toggleBuyButton = false const onClickButton = (event) => { toggleBuyButton = !toggleBuyButton }; export const ItemView = ({item, onClickPay }) => (
Previous Next

{item.name}

Some description of the item. Some description of the item....................................

Price ${item.price}

{ toggleButton?

Payment Details

: "" }
); ItemView.propTypes = { item: PropTypes.shape({ name: PropTypes.string.isRequired, price: PropTypes.string.isRequired, img: PropTypes.string.isRequired }), onClickPay: PropTypes.func.isRequired };
